project_description: A simple Flutter app using the Cubit pattern for state management, with a login screen and a home screen.
architecture_overview: The app follows a modular architecture with clear separation of concerns. Each screen, Cubit, and model is placed in its respective folder. The app uses the Cubit pattern for state management and follows the 'one class per file' principle.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Main entry point of the Flutter application. Sets up routing and provides the necessary Cubits.

files.name: lib/screens/login_screen.dart
files.description: Screen for user login. Contains text fields for email and password and a login button.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Home screen displayed after successful login. Contains a logout button.

files.name: lib/cubits/login_cubit.dart
files.description: Cubit responsible for managing the state of the login screen.

files.name: lib/cubits/home_cubit.dart
files.description: Cubit responsible for managing the state of the home screen.

widgets.name: LoginScreen
widgets.description: Screen for user login. Contains text fields for email and password and a login button.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: Home screen displayed after successful login. Contains a logout button.

cubits.name: LoginCubit
cubits.description: Cubit responsible for managing the state of the login screen.

cubits.name: HomeCubit
cubits.description: Cubit responsible for managing the state of the home screen.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the app.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> LoginScreen : Enter email and password
LoginScreen -> LoginCubit : login(email, password)
LoginCubit -> UserModel : Validate and create user
UserModel --> LoginCubit : User instance
LoginCubit --> LoginScreen : Success state
LoginScreen -> HomeScreen : Navigate to home screen
HomeScreen -> HomeCubit : Display home screen
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using Cubits. Each screen has a corresponding Cubit that handles its state. The LoginCubit manages the state of the login screen, including the login logic. Upon successful login, the HomeScreen is displayed, and the HomeCubit manages its state, including the logout logic.
navigation_flow: The app starts with the LoginScreen. Upon successful login, the app navigates to the HomeScreen. The HomeScreen contains a logout button that, when pressed, will navigate back to the LoginScreen.
